title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.
rt_quote: A moving, inspirational tale of hope and perseverance.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief leads a team into the subconscious minds to plant an idea in a target's mind.
rt_quote: A dazzlingly complex and thrilling ride into the dreamscape.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.
rt_quote: A beautifully crafted ode to dreams and love.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a rebel warrior to escape a tyrant.
rt_quote: A high-octane masterpiece of visual storytelling.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance for the death of his beloved dog.
rt_quote: Sleek, stylish, and satisfyingly brutal.

title: Die Hard
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and others taken hostage by terrorists.
rt_quote: The definitive action movie experience.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his team race against time after a mission gone wrong.
rt_quote: A breathtaking spectacle of action mastery.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his nemesis, the Joker, who wreaks havoc and chaos on Gotham City.
rt_quote: An electrifying portrayal of heroism and chaos.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor.
rt_quote: A sweeping epic of honor, vengeance, and destiny.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
description: A soldier caught in a time loop must learn to defeat alien invaders.
rt_quote: A wildly entertaining blend of sci-fi and action.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: Two detectives, one suicidal and one by-the-book, team up to fight crime.
rt_quote: The quintessential buddy-cop action flick.

title: Skyfall
description: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her.
rt_quote: A bold reinvention of the Bond legacy.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
description: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA operation while searching for his past.
rt_quote: An exhilarating, smartly-crafted thriller.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends scramble to enjoy one last party before graduation.
rt_quote: An endlessly quotable, riotously funny coming-of-age romp.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of a legendary concierge at a famous hotel between the wars.
rt_quote: A visual feast packed with eccentric delights.

title: Bridesmaids
description: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid over who is the bride's best friend.
rt_quote: A wildly funny, refreshingly honest take on female friendship.

title: Groundhog Day
description: A cynical weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over.
rt_quote: A brilliant, endlessly inventive comedy classic.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
description: A middle-aged man's friends try to help him lose his virginity.
rt_quote: Sweet, raunchy, and outrageously funny.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school.
rt_quote: A joyful, unforgettable ride through youthful rebellion.

title: School of Rock
description: A struggling musician turns a class of students into a rock band.
rt_quote: A hilarious and heartfelt ode to the power of music.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
description: A socially awkward teen helps his friend run for class president.
rt_quote: A wonderfully strange and charming offbeat comedy.

title: Crazy Rich Asians
description: An American-born Chinese woman travels to meet her boyfriend's insanely wealthy family.
rt_quote: A lavish, heartfelt romantic comedy with modern flair.

title: The Hangover
description: Three groomsmen lose their soon-to-be-wed buddy during their Vegas bachelor party.
rt_quote: A riotously funny and unpredictable ride.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in a desperate attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
rt_quote: A visually stunning and emotionally charged sci-fi odyssey.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner discovers a long-buried secret that leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.
rt_quote: A breathtaking, thought-provoking sequel that honors its predecessor.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.
rt_quote: A beautifully cerebral and emotional science fiction masterpiece.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
rt_quote: A groundbreaking sci-fi thriller that redefined a generation.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
rt_quote: A visually jaw-dropping, nerve-shredding thrill ride.

title: District 9
description: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions fights for its freedom.
rt_quote: A powerful, gritty sci-fi allegory with a fresh perspective.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence.
rt_quote: A sleek, cerebral thriller that explores the nature of consciousness.

title: Dune (2021)
description: Paul Atreides leads nomadic tribes in a battle to control the desert planet Arrakis.
rt_quote: A breathtaking, immersive spectacle of sci-fi storytelling.

title: Looper
description: In the future, a hitman discovers his target is his older self, leading to unforeseen consequences.
rt_quote: A smart, stylish, and thrilling take on time-travel.

title: Children of Men
description: In a bleak future where humans have become infertile, a disillusioned bureaucrat must protect the last pregnant woman on Earth.
rt_quote: A powerful and deeply moving sci-fi masterpiece.

title: Gone Girl
description: A man becomes the prime suspect in the disappearance of his wife in a media frenzy.
rt_quote: A masterful, chilling exploration of marriage and deceit.

title: Prisoners
description: When two young girls go missing, one father takes matters into his own hands.
rt_quote: A harrowing and emotionally gripping thriller.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
rt_quote: A brutally effective and chilling crime thriller.

title: Zodiac
description: Based on real events, a cartoonist becomes obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer.
rt_quote: A meticulous, haunting investigation into obsession.

title: Nightcrawler
description: A driven man blurs the lines between observer and participant in the world of crime journalism.
rt_quote: A chilling and darkly compelling character study.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: A journalist and a hacker dig into a family's dark secrets to solve a decades-old disappearance.
rt_quote: A dark, stylish mystery with riveting performances.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee seeks the advice of an imprisoned cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.
rt_quote: A tense and psychologically complex masterpiece.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter finds a stash of money left from a drug deal gone wrong, drawing ruthless pursuit.
rt_quote: A brutal, suspenseful exploration of fate and violence.

title: Wind River
description: A wildlife tracker and an FBI agent investigate a murder on a Native American reservation.
rt_quote: A powerful, haunting thriller set in a chilling landscape.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a remote psychiatric facility.
rt_quote: A visually haunting, mind-bending thriller.

title: The Babadook
description: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book manifests in their home.
rt_quote: A haunting, deeply emotional meditation on grief and fear.

title: Hereditary
description: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.
rt_quote: One of the most unsettling and artfully crafted horror films in years.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family must live in silence to avoid blind monsters with acute hearing.
rt_quote: A nerve-shredding thriller that's both terrifying and tender.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
rt_quote: A terrifying and masterfully crafted haunted house tale.

title: It Follows
description: A teenager is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.
rt_quote: A refreshingly original, slow-burning horror experience.

title: The Witch
description: A Puritan family encounters forces of evil in the woods beyond their New England farm.
rt_quote: A chilling, atmospheric descent into religious paranoia and dread.

title: Midsommar
description: A couple travels to a rural Swedish village's fabled mid-summer festival and becomes trapped in a pagan cult.
rt_quote: A mesmerizing, unsettling journey into sunlit terror.

title: The Others
description: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.
rt_quote: A beautifully crafted, chillingly effective ghost story.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend and uncovers a disturbing secret.
rt_quote: A brilliantly unsettling and socially conscious thriller.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where sinister forces drive the father into violence.
rt_quote: An atmospheric, slow-building masterpiece of horror.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy in this classic Jane Austen tale.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something emotional — this elegant period romance simmers with wit, pride, and slow-burning tension.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple falls in love in the 1940s but are soon separated by social differences and fate.
recommendation_reason: You mentioned wanting something passionate — this timeless love story captures the beauty and ache of a once-in-a-lifetime romance.

title: La La Land
description: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles.
recommendation_reason: You're craving something dreamy — this bittersweet musical romance is a vibrant tribute to love, art, and what might have been.

title: Before Sunrise
description: Two strangers meet on a train and spend one evening exploring Vienna and falling in love.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something thoughtful — this quiet, dialogue-rich romance captures the magic of connection and fleeting time.

title: Call Me by Your Name
description: In 1980s Italy, a summer romance blossoms between a 17-year-old boy and an older graduate student.
recommendation_reason: You asked for something sensual — this coming-of-age romance is tender, sun-drenched, and aching with unspoken longing.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
description: After a stint in a mental institution, Pat meets Tiffany — a mysterious woman with problems of her own.
recommendation_reason: You're looking for something offbeat — this quirky romance finds beauty in broken people and second chances.

title: Carol
description: An aspiring photographer and an older woman fall in love in 1950s New York against societal expectations.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something tender — this beautifully restrained romance is full of stolen glances and quiet rebellion.

title: About Time
description: A young man discovers he can travel through time and uses the ability to find love and fix life’s mistakes.
recommendation_reason: You're in the mood for something feel-good — this romantic gem mixes time travel with deep warmth and everyday magic.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic.
recommendation_reason: You’re craving something epic — this sweeping romance blends grandeur and tragedy in unforgettable fashion.

title: 500 Days of Summer
description: A nonlinear story of a young man who reflects on his failed relationship with a woman who didn’t believe in love.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something playful yet real — this offbeat romance dissects love and heartbreak with charm and honesty.

title: Paddington 2
description: Paddington the bear spreads joy and marmalade as he searches for the perfect gift and ends up in a wild adventure.
recommendation_reason: You asked for something wholesome — this delightful family film is full of charm, kindness, and lovable chaos.

title: The Parent Trap (1998)
description: Identical twins separated at birth meet at summer camp and scheme to reunite their parents.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something heartwarming — this playful classic is full of clever tricks and sweet surprises.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something touching — this animated adventure is a heartfelt journey of courage, family, and friendship.

title: The Sound of Music
description: A governess brings music and love to a strict family in Nazi-occupied Austria.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something joyful — this classic musical blends heart, history, and unforgettable songs.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A young boy befriends a gentle alien stranded on Earth and helps him return home.
recommendation_reason: You asked for something magical — this family classic celebrates friendship, wonder, and childlike awe.

title: Julie & Julia
description: The parallel stories of Julia Child’s rise to fame and a modern woman finding purpose through cooking.
recommendation_reason: You’re looking for something cozy — this warm, foodie-filled story celebrates finding joy in the everyday.

title: The Intouchables
description: An unlikely friendship forms between a quadriplegic aristocrat and his free-spirited caregiver.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something uplifting — this French gem is both hilarious and deeply moving.

title: Chef
description: A disgraced chef starts a food truck, reconnecting with his passion and his son.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something light — this feel-good film is a tasty blend of family, creativity, and second chances.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: An introverted man escapes into daydreams — and eventually, real-life adventures — in search of a missing photo.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something hopeful — this whimsical journey reminds us it’s never too late to start living.

title: Amélie
description: A shy waitress in Paris decides to change the lives of those around her for the better.
recommendation_reason: You’re craving something whimsical — this feel-good classic is full of heart, charm, and tiny acts of magic.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a mysterious spirit world and must find a way to save her parents.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something magical — this stunning animated tale is full of wonder, spirits, and quiet strength.

title: Inside Out
description: The emotions inside a young girl’s mind struggle to help her navigate a big move.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something heartfelt — this clever animated journey explores feelings in a way that’s both fun and deeply moving.

title: Coco
description: A young boy ventures into the Land of the Dead to unlock his family’s musical legacy.
recommendation_reason: You asked for something emotional — this vibrant story celebrates family, memory, and the power of music.

title: Toy Story 3
description: As Andy heads to college, Woody, Buzz, and the gang face an uncertain future.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something nostalgic — this animated finale tugs at the heartstrings while reminding us why growing up is so hard.

title: The Iron Giant
description: A boy befriends a giant robot from outer space in 1950s America, teaching it what it means to be human.
recommendation_reason: You're in the mood for something heroic — this touching animated classic is about courage, identity, and self-sacrifice.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The life of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, and his battle with schizophrenia.
recommendation_reason: You're looking for something inspiring — this drama delivers a deeply human story of genius, struggle, and triumph.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something uplifting — this emotional drama captures the grit and love behind one man’s fight for a better life.

title: Manchester by the Sea
description: A man returns to his hometown after the death of his brother and faces his painful past.
recommendation_reason: You're seeking something emotional — this drama unfolds slowly, with raw grief and complex humanity at its core.

title: Moonlight
description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and adulthood.
recommendation_reason: You're in the mood for something reflective — this poetic drama offers a tender, powerful portrait of self-discovery and vulnerability.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's founding and the personal and legal battles that followed.
recommendation_reason: You wanted something sharp and tense — this drama peels back the genius and rivalry behind one of tech's biggest revolutions.

title: Room
description: Held captive for years, a woman and her young son finally escape and begin a difficult journey toward healing.
recommendation_reason: You're looking for something emotional — this powerful drama explores trauma, resilience, and a mother’s fierce love.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unexpected relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
recommendation_reason: You’re in the mood for something thoughtful — this dreamy drama blends sci-fi with soulful intimacy in a story about love and identity.

title: The Father
description: A man struggles with aging and memory loss as his world becomes increasingly fragmented.
recommendation_reason: You're looking for something intense — this drama offers a haunting and empathetic glimpse into the experience of dementia.

title: Lion
description: A man uses Google Earth to find his long-lost family, decades after being separated as a child in India.
recommendation_reason: You asked for something emotional — this true story is a heartfelt journey of loss, identity, and reunion.
